lines.text: So a critical at a disadvantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I'm also gonna spend my die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whatever your last name is again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The die is for the attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's for attacks, skills, and saving throws, not for damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: five, six, seven, eight, that's 11 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of damage from the first one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 11 points of damage from the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It gets a bonus for being outdoors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He made a saving throw, to a six.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should have created sunglasses for him or something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have two of its eyes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It comes running forward like a giant armored gorilla. (grunts)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Reaching back with both of its claws, swiping at you Scanlan, that is a 23 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's looming over you, ready to try and finish you off next round.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With the second knife, sneak attack into his ball sack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (group yells triumphantly)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And rip it out his bum and out the back of him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm right next to him, it might spill on me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's all right, that's all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rush underneath, tumble, bringing your dagger up and slam it right under the bottom of its abdomen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's now-soft torso and belly left open from the armor plates being shot off, spills a number of its warm innards right onto Scanlan's body and form.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ugh, no! It went in my mouth! (Travis laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then it collapses on top of him..

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take six points of crushing damage as the umber hulk collapses on top of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I run over and shove the umber hulk off of Scanlan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go over to Scanlan, and I just, I just lay my hands on him, and I cast Cure Wounds in a level 2 spot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I roll or does he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cure Wounds, level two? 2d8 plus five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you heal him, touch him with the spell, you wipe the umber hulk ichor off of your hand.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I cast prestidigitation and clean everybody up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you should jump in that water, Scanlan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You should get in the water and clean yourself off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like the walking dead, you're gonna sneak by the rest of 'em?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I'm gonna keep the blood on me, if you don't mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of the caverns opens up this way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we take a short rest and heal up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you let some people heal?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm unscathed, so I run after Grog, just to give him backup if he needs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, you come around the corner to see what looks like a campfire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just chopping the shit out of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, look and search around and see what's in the bedding.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I try to keep like six or seven foot difference--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three crossbow bolts come flying out of nowhere--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a 29 of stealth as soon as the first arrow flew.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was a Coleman, alright? (group laughs) That was a very expensive sleeping bag.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Never attack the bedding before you know the thread count.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you take seven points of piercing damage, which is halved to four because you're raging.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you can see what looks like three small--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And some strange beast you've not seen before seems to be accompanying one of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like an oversized, swollen brain with a set of claws.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just like a large brain with a set of arms and legs like a panther.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's the brain bug from Starship Troopers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you haven't been seen, and you have the first action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are they on the same level as us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I can dash and still attack?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would love to, uh-- where's this thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well if you dash as your action--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I can't stealth? So to stay stealth, I need to go normal speed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you move and use your action to move as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's all you'll be able to do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what it's called, right? And wait?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the trigger is when this asshole duergar moves forward, I'm gonna stick him in the back of the neck.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (group laughs) What has Grog gotten himself into?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I see, how tall is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All you see is Grog standing with three bolts sticking out of his chest now.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I can't do anything too much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything else, Tiberius? Gotta keep this moving.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Call Trinket as I'm doing it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually you can move two more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I see anything from that point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All you see is Grog over there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're covered and he's around the bend, so I'd run in further.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I run in and stealth or is that it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm gonna try to stealth as I'm going in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're at disadvantage on the stealth roll, but go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus my stealth, which is five.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's all this stealthing? Where's all the killing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm gonna move right there into the room as far as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can cast over in this area, which is the only thing you have view of.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, oh, because that's a big rock in my view there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a big rock right there, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll put it right where you're saying, right there, yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Scanlan, are you doing an ass cloud again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can hear this now between the rest of you, echoing throughout.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I was just going to say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You hear a cacophonous amount of hacking, coughing, as all of them drop their attack stances and begin just retching, nearly vomiting, in the middle of this green cloud of gas.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll also take a great heal potion? Is that what they're called? Not moderate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, greater heal potion is 4d4 plus four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that brings us to Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm gonna start heading down this direction, and I'm going to actually spend a movement, spend my action and move a little further down, about, yeah, about there, so I can start getting a good look of what's up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That brings us to Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so I am going to take this and move up to about here, I guess.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I'm gonna take this little block of stone right here, this stalagtite or mite or whatever it is--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And instead of creating a wall, I'm just gonna take that one and I'm gonna push it (imitates thudding) against that wall and try and crush those guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait, you're gonna use Wall of Stone to try and push that back?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm gonna take this wall, and I'm gonna go crunch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm trying to earthbend this wall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey Grog. Did you ever write down our underwater spell, potion thingies, whatever those were called?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, did you right it down, though? 'Cause I didn't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you could lock them into an area, if that's what you wanted to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the nature of the spell, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just gonna lightning bolt some bitches.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have view of any of them right now, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, then I move to where I can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The man in charge of our fates.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You had to get a long distance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, because you were back here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck those Wizards of the Coast, man! I do what I wanna do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And what's the DC again of your spell?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Spell save DC, is that right? 19.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's nowhere for him to retch from.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It moves out of the cloud, looks over at you Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an intelligence saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, those aren't good for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It actually shakes you a moment from your rage, which then fills your mind once again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like Kenny G music coming through my brain.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, he needs the full Magneto.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your intelligence is brought to zero.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ah! But I was at six!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to-- (Matt laughs) Tiberius.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like when I tried to read 50 Shades of Grey. (groans)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay, I'm gonna go right up to where Grog is.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Now can I see the brain fucker?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's a lover, not a fighter.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm gonna fire a glacial blast at this dude.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we call him Jeff, Jeff Lobey?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you put your arms out, you focus this blast of just freezing cold arcane energy that slams into the side of this brain creature.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lisa Lobey! (group laughs) They just keep going!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the brain just (imitates shattering) cascades across the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, you're now seeing three dwarves retching and coughing over, kind of looking about very nervously.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I move to where I can get a line of site on that one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can move to there and get a line of sight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah yeah yeah, I'm gonna do that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You still have a little bit of cover.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just be a badass, okay? That's your job.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I should've tried to-- it's okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's weird, Grog weirdly seems smarter now than he was before.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Professor Grog's having a hard time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then the six for a Hunter's Mark is five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other ones look nervously about.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I knew we were gonna be going down into some--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear him say, "Quick, there's our exit! "Back, back to the master."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I did not understand them, right? So I don't know that they're going to run.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let 'em run back to the master and we'll track 'em.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I call out that I heard them? Say, "Don't let them run!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, this happening just as you heard them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't have a good line of sight on them, so I don't even know that they're there really, right? I just hear coughing in the distance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you go ahead and you focus, you cast Dispel Magic in Grog's vicinity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the shift of arcane, waving energy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: ♫ If I only had a brain ♫

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does not seem to have an effect.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It doesn't do it! Damn it! Then as my bonus action, can I still give him an inspiration dice to do on like saving...?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The cantaloupe, it's not gonna feel better about itself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, then I give my dice to Vax.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've tried insulting a cantaloupe, you just don't get anywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think the chat room's catching on for those who know D&D well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I hear a little shithead grey-skinned dwarf--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take my laser.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your laser? Point your laser? (Liam imitates ray gun)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I want to crawl forward to the other side of Grog over there, so I can see this little jerk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's one of my magical things that I do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three-quarters cover according to the new rules.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I ignore half or three-quarters cover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then you can ignore three-quarters cover, which he has. So, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm also going to take a penalty to my attack bonus to attempt to do some damage and to not kill, but injure, if possible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wanna leave one for questioning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or do you want to just do subdual damage, which is what you're doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a normal attack, there's no penalty to it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just my penalty for extra damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a deahtblow, but you see she has been incapacitated.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I call out, "Let one of them live, so I can question them."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably blew out its eardrums from the cacophonous blast of the thunder.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, and there's a big cloud of poo stink around them, so--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And just hunker down and try to hold him hostage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a constitution check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that a, is that a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage, because you're holding your breath.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Use the dice! Use the dice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d8 to add to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you rush in the cloud, (breathes deeply) you run in, pull your daggers out, and because this isn't a natural cloud, the arcane force puts it in your nostrils and you can't help yourself. (coughs) Your turn immediately ends as you begin feeling your lunch retching up into your stomach.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we heal him, what is it? What do we need to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll figure that out when we kill this guy, I guess.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I might be able to cure him afterwards.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tiberius, can you dispel that shit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a restoration spell, it's not a dispel.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: This guy, that's the one that we knocked out with the arrow?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: The dead one or the one we knocked out?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And the one right here is...?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The one by me is weak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of them are pretty weak right now, actually.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I think I can step next to Percy without stepping into that cloud.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can step over Grog, get around here, you mean?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I will shoot a firebolt at the butthole across the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll for the attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You aim, and it manages to just pull out of the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I step over, and I try to shoot the one that he just-- I stay out of the stink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I ask Scanlan to dispel the stank cloud.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I yell-- Can I yell out "surrender" in Undercommon?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was a very good Klingon translation.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is with the dice tonight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's where we'll end the game tonight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was gonna say, can I go over and heal Grog before we end?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, we're picking up next week.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have to wait a week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, is this seven to nine?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Crazy, that's like, two weeks in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you get a Player's Handbook. That's lucky.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We'll get you your shit! I gotta print that photo so you guys can all sign it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes yes, let's go do that.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: No, it'll probably be sent to you next Friday, 'cause we'll have you guys sign it next Thursday.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Zac, do you have any renew intelligence potions on you, by chance?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: For an hour, hour and a half.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go, rock it out.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: And tomorrow night we will be back with So You Don't Have to, which is a show where Hector and Becca play the weirdest games they can find online, so you don't have to.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We have a band coming in to play.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: How do you say it? Spinning?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Lucas, if you wanna go ahead and roll those videos, and we'll get you guys out of here.
